get.description: Returns the top ad affinities categorized into three levels based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: dataTag
parameters.description: The data tag to filter results

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for filtering data (YYYY-MM-DD), defaults to 1950-01-01

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for filtering data (YYYY-MM-DD), defaults to today's date

200.description: Successful response with ad categories statistics

percent.description: Percentage represented as a string with two decimal places

BadRequestError.description: Invalid or malformed user input: check your SQL, parameters, and encoding

ForbiddenError.description: Access token is missing or invalid: the request does not have enough permissions to be completed

NotFoundError.description: Resource not found: the data source, pipe, or endpoint is missing

MethodNotAllowedError.description: The method is not allowed in this resource

InternalServerError.description: Server could not fulfill the request due to an internal problem: contact support@tinybird.co
